name: HELLOANUPA

projects.title: Burger Shop Web App
projects.description: Modern burger shop web app using React, Node.js, MongoDB. Responsive design, secure authentication, smooth ordering, admin dashboard, fast performance, user-friendly experience.

projects.title: GYM Web App
projects.description: Developed a modern gym platform using React, Node.js, and MongoDB. Users track progress, manage plans, book sessions, enjoy responsive experience.

services.title: Frontend Development
services.description: Building responsive, user-friendly, and visually appealing interfaces using modern frameworks like React, Vue, or Angular.

services.title: Backend Development
services.description: Designing and implementing scalable server-side logic, APIs, and databases using technologies like Node.js, Express, Django, or Ruby on Rails.

services.title: Deployment & DevOps
services.description: Deploying applications to cloud platforms like AWS, Azure, or Heroku, and managing continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines for smooth releases.

services.title: Database Management
services.description: Setting up, optimizing, and maintaining relational and non-relational databases such as MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, or Firebase.

aboutpara: Hi, I'm Anupa Amarasekara! I'm a developer who began my coding journey in 2019. Now, I'm diving into web development, UI/UX design, and app development while pursuing a BSc Degree in Information Technology at the Sri Lanka Institute of Information Technology. I also share my content and knowledge with over 10k followers on my Instagram page. Let's join forces and delve into the exciting world of technology together!

resume.description: I have delivered world-class user experiences to millions of people. Well-versed with React, Javascript, and most of the Web frameworks.
